name: PRONI Center for youth development
goal:
- Quality assured youth work development
- Human rights promotion and protection
- Promotion of volunteerism and activism amongst youth
- Resource center for other CSOs
- Promotion of European integrations
- Youth policy development
- Reconciliation and Peace building
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Youth
